docs.lead_paragraph: It was discovered yesterday that three cases of smallpox were removed from the New York Foundling Asylum on Saturday last and taken to North Brother Island. The cases were not reported by the Board of Health until yesterday. The oldest of the three afflicted children is four years and the youngest eight months.

headline.main: FOUNDLINGS HAVE SMALLPOX.; Three Cases Removed from the New York Asylum -- Driver Forgot to Get Vaccinated -- Is Now in Hospital.

docs.abstract: And Assoc. for Improving the Condition of the Poor; Joint Report for Third Fiscal Year
